SEARCH
Module cz.cvut.fel.pjv.hofmaad
Package controller

Class SimulationController

java.lang.Object
controller.SimulationController
public class SimulationController extends Object
Controls the simulation of network communications, handling animations, and packet transmissions.

      Parameters:
      simulationWorkspaceView - The user interface for the simulation.
      storage - Storage for all network devices.
      networksController - Controller that manages network settings and behaviors.

      networkConnection - The network connection to send the packet on.
      sourceMac - The MAC address of the source device.

    • sendArpRequest

      public void sendArpRequest(NetworkConnection networkConnection, MACAddress senderMac, IPAddress senderIp, IPAddress targetIp)
      Sends an ARP request over a network connection.
      Parameters:
      networkConnection - The network connection over which the ARP request is sent.
      senderMac - The MAC address of the sender.
      senderIp - The IP address of the sender.
      targetIp - The target IP address for the ARP request.

    • sendDhcpOffer

      public void sendDhcpOffer(NetworkConnection networkConnection, MACAddress sourceMac, MACAddress dstMac, IPAddress sourceIpAddress, DhcpOfferMessage dhcpOfferMessage)
      Sends a DHCP offer response to a DHCP discovery.
      Parameters:
      networkConnection - The network connection to send the DHCP offer on.
      sourceMac - The source MAC address.
      dstMac - The destination MAC address.
      sourceIpAddress - The IP address of the DHCP server.
      dhcpOfferMessage - The DHCP offer message containing the offered IP address and subnet mask.

    • sendDhcpResponse

      public void sendDhcpResponse(NetworkConnection networkConnection, MACAddress sourceMac, MACAddress dstMac, IPAddress sourceIpAddress, IPAddress dstIpAddress, DhcpResponseMessage dhcpResponseMessage)
      Sends a DHCP response message, typically acknowledging configuration settings.
      Parameters:
      networkConnection - The network connection to send the DHCP response on.
      sourceMac - The source MAC address.
      dstMac - The destination MAC address.
      sourceIpAddress - The IP address of the DHCP server.
      dstIpAddress - The IP address of the DHCP client.
      dhcpResponseMessage - The DHCP response message to be sent.

    • sendDhcpAck

      public void sendDhcpAck(NetworkConnection networkConnection, MACAddress sourceMac, MACAddress dstMac, IPAddress sourceIpAddress, IPAddress dstIpAddress, DhcpAckMessage dhcpAckMessage)
      Sends a DHCP acknowledgment message.
      Parameters:
      networkConnection - The network connection to send the DHCP ACK on.
      sourceMac - The source MAC address.
      dstMac - The destination MAC address.
      sourceIpAddress - The IP address of the DHCP server.
      dstIpAddress - The IP address of the DHCP client.
      dhcpAckMessage - The DHCP acknowledgment message.

      Creates a visual representation of a frame based on the type of message it carries.
      Parameters:
      frame - The frame for which the visual representation is created.
      Returns:
